column1: european_unification_desc;We can declare war on any european kingdom in order to bring it under the authority of the Union.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
european_invasion_desc;We can declare war on Britain in order to avenge their betrayal of the Union in the distant past.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
european_union_bloodline; Blood of the European President;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
european_union_bloodline_desc;The great ruler who united western europe under the banner of a resurgent European Union.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_european_union_restoration;The peoples of the European continent are numerous
column4: this great melting pot of peoples were once united under the European Union. Above culture
column6: the Union was a mighty state ruled by a President elected by a council of nobles from each corner of the realm. The Union brought the promise of prosperity to all that it ruled
column7: and defended europe from threats both within and without. This was not to last
column9: and the great Union of Europe collapsed of uncertain causes
column10: and many believe that it fell due to the onslaught of the event itself. Nevertheless
column11: the memory of the great state endured
column13: you have amassed enough power to declare yourself the President of All Europe
column16: and the rightful sovereign of the continent.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: OPT_A_european_union_restoration;Europe shall be united once more;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_european_invasion;In the age before the event
column2: the Union is said to have ruled over the entirety of Europe
column3: and all its varied peoples. It is uncertain as to what exactly caused its collapse. Was it an invasion? a terrible plague? a disastrous famine? a devastating civil war? Perhaps it was the event itself
column4: whatever that may be? Nobody knows
column5: but what is known for sure is that
column6: at the union's most vulnerable moment
column7: and at its time of greatest need
column8: the vassal kingdom of Britain betrayed the Union
column9: and abandoned it to its fate. The people of Europe would never forgive the acts of Perfidious Albion. The president of the restored Union could not let this humiliation go unavenged
column11: the great leader of the europeans has decreed that the time has come to make war upon the British
column12: and to lay waste their island.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: OPT_A_european_invasion;Even their "Queen" can't save them now.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC_european_invasion_victory;Britannia has fallen. The land of traitors has been crushed beneath the iron boot of the european juggernaut. Flags with twelve yellow stars on blue can be seen flying all across London
column2: and union troops march across the breadth of the islands to cement our hold over them. We have been avenged.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: OPT_A_european_invasion_victory;Let this be a warning to all those who oppose us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
